channel.title: Ubuntu Network Configuration :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Note This video was recorded on Ubuntu 18.04, but nothing significant has changed in Ubuntu 20.04. –Russ YouTube Video Resources How to Configure Static IP Address on Ubuntu 20.04 Focal Fossa Desktop/Server from LinuxConfig.org Network Configuration from Ubuntu Server Guide ‘ip’ Command Cheat Sheet (Command Line Reference) from The Geek Diary ip Command Cheat Sheet from Red Hat Even though it is for Red Hat, most of these commands should also work in Ubuntu, and honestly, it is just a really handy cheat sheet to have!
